author: denizsun
body:
#### PR description:

-This PR implements masking of channels in HEP07 (RM 3, RMfib 4) that were affected by sporadic bad data.
-The modification was made in the RawTask.cc code to mask the relevant channels only in the alarm plot (BadQ_FEDvsLSmod10).
-Additionally, the same masking was applied to other related plots such as BadQ_FEDvsLS.
-This PR does not depend on any other PRs or externals

- Additional information: See related issue: [HCAL DQM Issue #242](https://gitlab.cern.ch/cmshcal/docs/-/issues/242)

#### PR validation:
This PR is not a backport; however, it is planned to be backported.

@salimcerci
title: [HCAL-DQM] Mask channels in HEP07 (RM 3, RMfib 4) affected by sporadic bad data
